nodes.text: Trade Federation Center was an area of the Karthakk system under control of the Trade Federation during the time of the Galactic Civil War. The Trade Federation set up a research center in the outer reaches of this system. It was there hope to collect segments of the Spine of Lok, studying the obsidian rocks to provide information to various allies about possible sales and alliances. However, several spies discovered that the Trade Federation had been conducting these secret experiments away from the eyes of the Galactic Empire and other potential enemies.

Trade Federation Center was a location in Jump to Lightspeed, the 2004 expansion pack for the massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011.
